page.title: 07Newbridge and Blackbarn
page.content: { Newbridge Farm}is a Marsh Sheep Farm owned by Mr. Dickinson. We saw some chickens and ducks and his 3 dogs called Ben, Rusty and Tramp. Mr. Dickinson has 650 ewes and we went through a barn and saw some orphan lambs and in the hay we saw a rat stealing some sheep food. Near the river there is a shepherd's hut which is about 200 years old and which is now used to store tools. As it is a Marsh farm it is about 50 years old and was previously under the sea. { Blackbarn Farm}is 10 acres and they use tractors, drotts and bailers. There are cows, donkeys and sheep making 60 animals in all which are fed twice a day. We tried out the electric fence and found it was on - it made us jump! We made the giant mouse wheel turn by walking on it, (this is really a cattle feeder).
